member.name: T:Nokia.Utility.BufferPolicyBase
member.summary: Base class for IBuffer implementation policies.
member.remarks:
This class should be derived from in order to create an IBuffer implementation. It can then be used by the Buffer class which handles all the WinRT/COM specifics.
Make sure the OpenData method returns your custom BufferDataPolicyBase-derived object.

member.name: M:Nokia.Utility.BufferDataPolicyBase.GetPointer
member.summary: Returns a pointer to the data. The pointer is valid at least until this object is destroyed.

member.name: T:Nokia.Utility.BufferDataPolicyBase
member.summary: Base class for IBufferByteAccess implementation policies.
member.remarks: This class should be derived from and wraps logic "during" buffer data access. An object of the class will be created when the data is starting to be accessed, and destroyed when the data is no longer used. NOTE: This differs from normal WinRT semantics! But holds true for the SDK.
